description:
You are enthusiastic, and open to new opinions.
Some people are all talk and no action, but you are not one of them.
Also, your assertive, 'can-do' attitude makes you naturally charming and likable.
Since you often feel natural being in a social setting,
you are often known as the social butterfly.
These traits would make you an Action movie.

You are an idealist and tend to have high expectations.
You care deeply about the world you live in,
and strive to make the world a better place for everyone.
You are hungry for meaning and inspiration,
but sometimes your dreamer characteristics compromise
your ability to deal with the minutiae of daily life.
Accordingly, these traits would make you an Anime movie.

You are often known as the caretaker.
You are highly aware of the others' need
and seek to help others frequently and sincerely.
Yet, you are often come across as childish,
because you like to laugh and unwind by being playful.
You do not enjoy the potential angst
that serious topics can create and thus avoid them at times.
These traits would make you a Children movie.

You are loyal and supportive.
You work hard and enjoy being part of a harmonious environment.
You try your best to be cooperative to the people around you,
sometimes even at your own expense.
You value tradition and formality,
and these traits would make you a Classic movie.

You are optimistic and gregarious.
You are gifted at figuring out what will be fun for everyone,
so you are often known as the entertainer or the class clown.
These spontaneous, energetic, and fun-loving characterstics
would make you a Comedy movie

You are a great strategic thinker and a creative problem solver.
Accordingly, you are drawned to things you cannot fully understand,
especially to the things that are highly complex
or have some exotic, mystical element that does not yield to analysis.
It can be challenging at times being someone
who feels different from most people you encounter,
but that doesn't mean there aren't people
who appreciate what makes you so unique.
These traits would make you a Cult movie.

You are a pragmatic organizer.
You value efficiency above anything else,
and have little time for anything ethereal or conceptual.
You value evidence over conjecture, and always stay grounded in reality.
These traits would make you a Documentary movie.

You are warm, sensitive, humble and modest.
You don't like to be arrogant, and don't like to upset others.
Consequently, you hardly ever self-promote.
Because you are loyal, patient, and naturally warm,
these traits would make you a Romance movie.

You are innovative and have a curious mindeset.
You have the motivation to resolve challenging problems,
and you also have the ability to see the big picture
that enables you to generate alternative approaches to the problem.
Because you are flexible and have creative problem-solving skills,
these traits would make you a Fantasy movie.

You are known for your strong insights about people and situation.
You can read between the lines, pick up on nonverbal cues
and note the disparity between what people are saying and what people really feel.
Because you are able to see others' flaws, insecurities or even secrets,
people are sometimes intimidated by you.
These traits would make you a Horror movie.

You believe in focusing on your work
and motivating yourself to remain committed to finish something you have started.
You enjoy order and organization in all areas of your life
including your home, work, family, and projects.
Because being hip isn't always the most important thing for you,
you are usually not interested in keeping up with mainstream news.
These traits would make you an Independent movie.

You are often known as the mastermind,
due to your strategic, logical way of thinking and strong sense of intuition.
Accordingly, to the people around you, you are often considered the best person to get advice from.
Your insight allows you to not only predict the outcome
but come up with solutions to create positive and lasting change.
Also, you always keep at least one eye on the bigger picture,
so that you can step outside of your normal environment and expand your vision.
These traits would make you an International movie.

You are great at being the center of attention.
Accordingly, you are also known as the leader.
Your communication skills, enthusiasm and charisma allow you to get people on board with your ideas.
You are good at creating supportive and cooperative working environment.
Because you are warm and harmonious, these traits would make you a Musical movie.

You are often known as the troubleshooter because you are flexible, tolerant and logical.
Accordingly, you are ready to adapt to the situation at hand.
You can also pick up on details of the current situation,
and evaluate information in a detached and logical way.
Because of your ability to create a vision that is deeply rooted in logic,
you would be a Sci-Fi movie.

You are often described as the leader of leaders.
You are good at organizing and implementing long term plans for change.
You also have a clear vision for the future,
and that allows you to lead others with confidence and decisiveness.
Because challenging yourself tends to energize you, you are often known as the thrill-seeker.
You like the senseation of pushing yourself to the limit and experience something totally new.
These traits would make you a Thriller movie.

You are often known as the Adventurer.
You are active, playful, fun and charming.
Consequently, you are filled with a thirst for adventure and a hunger for novelty and action.
These traits would make you a Sports movie.
